scripts.deploy:dev: firebase use development && npm run build:dev && firebase deploy
scripts.deploy:prod: firebase use production && npm run build && firebase deploy
scripts.deploy:functions:dev: firebase use development && firebase deploy --only functions
scripts.deploy:functions:prod: firebase use production && firebase deploy --only functions
scripts.deploy:hosting:dev: firebase use development && npm run build:dev && firebase deploy --only hosting
scripts.deploy:hosting:prod: firebase use production && npm run build && firebase deploy --only hosting
